graphic.translation[0].definitions[0].de: a graphic account or description of an event is very clear and gives a lot of details, especially unpleasant ones
graphic.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: a graphic account of her unhappy childhood
His illness is described in graphic detail.
graphic.translation[0].definitions[1].de: connected with or including drawing, printing, or designing
graphic.translation[1].definitions[0].de: relating to drawing, printing, designing etc
graphic.translation[1].definitions[0].ex: displays ofgraphic arts, including architectural drawings
graphic.translation[2].definitions[0].de: a picture on a computer screen
graphic.translation[2].definitions[1].de: a drawing giving information in a newspaper, magazine, television news programme etc
graphic.translation[2].definitions[1].ex: The graphic with the article shows the proportion of female workers in various industries.
